content:
/>
IX.iii.1.E.6.
a
.
Counting Nonrecurring Income
Count nonrecurring income for 12 months from the first day of the month after the month during which the income is received.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
